# R basics  

In this section we will be dealing with basic operations using R. One should be aware of these basics before proceeding to any kind of data analysis using R.  

**Basic arithmetic operations**  
+ (addition)   
- (subtraction)  
* (multiplication)  
/ (division)  
^ (exponentiation)
